title: thAradhipAnana (thAna thillAnA)
sahitya:
tAradhipAnana dasharatha tanaya sadaya ninnu nammi 
shrI rAma smitamukha shrIdhara shrInivAsA nannu brOvumu

anupallavi

 tAm takiTa takadaNam takadhimita dhIm dhImta trikututaka dinu tadhinigiNatOm 
tAm dhrudhru tillillAna dhrudhru nAdhru nAdhru dhru dhru tom dhrudhrudhru 
taka tadhingiNatOm tadhingiNatOm dhingiNatOm giNatOm NatOm tOm
